title: [Large-scale] Analysis of the Predictive Relationship Between Formative Assessment and Learning Outcomes: Instructional Design Based on Learning Analytics Models

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis, LMS (Learning Management System) experience, and practical experience in language education
context.additional_context: A Course for Practicing Professionals Focusing on Formative Assessment Design Methods Applicable to Language Education Content Development, Including Predictive Modeling Practice Based on Learning Analytics Data

learning_goals: Learners can analyze correlations between formative assessment data and learning outcomes using learning analytics models (e.g., Random Forest).
Learners can design formative assessment tools (quizzes, assignments, etc.) aligned with Learning Outcomes (LOS).
Learners can collect and analyze learning activity log data (e.g., video viewing duration, resource usage frequency) to improve evaluation prediction models.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
